content: to make this carpet you will need * 1200 meters of cotton string 5 mm thick it s better to order a bit more string just to be on the safe side * a crochet hook 10 mm thick in the us size n/p * about 8-9 hours of your time this carpet measures roughly 210x170 cm if you use a 5 mm thick cotton string if you use a string of smaller thicknes the dimensions will decrease but i can t predict by how much no matter what string you use remember **one important thing ** the crochet hook needs to be twice as thick as the string otherwise the carpet will come out crooked for example if your string is 3 mm thick the crochet hook should be 6 mm thick in the us size j **another important thing ** you should be sitting on the carpet while crocheting it this way the carpet will appear as if it has already been washed and blocked because you have been ironing it with your buttocks while crocheting d if you crochet the carpet while sitting on the couch it will come out crooked and uneven instructions are available * in english in my ravelry store * in polish on my blog 1 1 http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/2016/01/drugie-zycie-muszelki html
